Html: Are the Google Map Providers the only ones that support the DirectionsProvider? I am getting everything else I need from the OpenStreetMapProvider but I also need a list of directions (that can be printed), so far I have found nothing but the Google Map Providers support the DirectionsProvider (it is possible I am just missing it in the source code). I know the ArcGIS providers will require an Esri account & credits to work so that is out for pretty much anyone.
